shortdesc.ph: Request status codes for the music content center.

plentry.pd: 1: General error with no specific cause.

2: Gateway error. Possible reasons include:
The current temporary Token has expired. Please regenerate a temporary Token.
The provided temporary Token is invalid. Make sure you are using an RTM temporary Token.
Network error. Please check your network connection.
3: Permission error or music resource does not exist. Make sure your project has enabled the Agora copyrighted music content center. For assistance, contact technical support.
4: Internal data parsing error. Please contact technical support.
5: Error occurred while loading the music resource. Please contact technical support.
6: Error occurred while decrypting the music resource. Please contact technical support.
7: Internal HTTP error occurred. Please try again later.
